name: Twin Striker
description: Twin Striker is a melee DPS class equipped with two powerful axes. A class which deals constant damage and has skills which keep them alive as long as they deal damage.The class will have a combo meter that awards the character bonus damage for every successful attack. Combo meter is X%/130% bonus damage.
quote: A close-range class that unleashes a fierce, continuous attack with two axes.

basicSkills.name: Beast Swing
basicSkills.description: Chain attack, the 4th attack deals additional damage and applies a damage reduction debuff on the enemy.

basicSkills.name: Axe Tornado
basicSkills.description: Shielding skill to block incoming damage until Endurance hits “0”. You can activate counter mode by clicking Left Click while holding up the shield.

tacticalSkills.name: Brutal Blow
tacticalSkills.description: Launch a rotating slash attack in a wide area in front of you.

tacticalSkills.name: Crimson Blow
tacticalSkills.description: Launches a fire spinning attack that can be charged up to 3 times.

tacticalSkills.name: Fall Impact
tacticalSkills.description: Attack enemies by leaping forward and land on ground.

tacticalSkills.name: Lava Impact
tacticalSkills.description: Make an attack by jumping and hitting the ground that can be used up to 3 times in a row. Fire type attack.

tacticalSkills.name: Storm Rush
tacticalSkills.description: Make a forward, two side-by-side attack in a wide area.

tacticalSkills.name: Burning Rush
tacticalSkills.description: Throws slashes of fire attacking enemies. The combo increases depending on the charge level.

tacticalSkills.name: Blood Axe
tacticalSkills.description: Allow you to absorb HP when you inflict damage to enemies.

tacticalSkills.name: War Cry
tacticalSkills.description: Grants Super Armor status for a fixed time. (You won't be staggered when you get hit by enemies in this state).

ultimateSkill.name: Vortex Impact
ultimateSkill.description: Rushes towards the enemy and rises in the air. Whirl and send the enemy back to the ground.
